content:
1. Praise their efforts and accomplishments.
2. Listen actively to what they have to say.
3. Offer words of affirmation and positivity.
4. Recognize their strengths and unique qualities.
5. Give specific feedback and constructive criticism.
6. Show your support with actions, such as attending events they are involved in.
7. Express gratitude and appreciation for their contributions.
8. Offer help and resources to assist them in achieving their goals.
9. Share personal stories of similar experiences and how you overcame obstacles.
10. Celebrate their successes and encourage them to continue striving for their goals.
